children.value: Neuxus tutorial! If you're new to Nexus and want a guided learning journey, this is the place! Through a handful of chapters we're going to be building just enough of a blog to give you an overview of Nexus; what it is and what it can do.
This tutorial is still under construction. Some chapters will continue to be refined and more added. If you're looking for our old tutorial content, it can still be found
Throughout this journey, we'll be making a few minor assumptions about your toolchain to keep the content flowing:

If you're using another set of tools, like Yarn on Windows with Sublime Text, that's totally fine and welcome! Just know that at you'll occasionally need to adapt minor instructions to your situation.
